mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Lee, Robert E. (Robert Edward), 1807-1870
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Lee writes to the Virginia General Assembly's Speaker of the House, John B. Baldwin, of Augusta County, on the importance of extending the Virginia Central Railroad to the Ohio River.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Railroads -- Virginia -- History -- 19th century

Virginia Central Railroad Company
James River and Kanawha Canal (Va.)
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter from R. E. Lee to John B. Baldwin, February 26, 1866 (correspondence)
